Method Detail

evaluate

boolean evaluate()
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                        SmartFrogException
Evaluate the condition.

Returns:
true if it is successful, false if not
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - for network problems
SmartFrogException - for any other problem
